verses.text:
More of Je-sus would I know, More of His grace to oth-ers show;
More of His sav-ing full-ness see, More of His love who died for me.

More of Je-sus let me learn, More of His ho-ly will dis-cern;
Spir-it of God, my teach-er be, Show-ing the things of Christ to me.

More of His sav-ing word of truth, More of His love that guards my youth;
More of His bless-ed pres-ence bright, More of His king-dom's ho-ly light.

More of His com-ing in the skies, More hope when earth-ly com-fort dies;
More of His soon ap-pear-ing here, More of His glo-ry shall ap-pear.

chorus.text:
More, more of Je-sus, More, more of Je-sus;
More of His sav-ing full-ness see, More of His love who died for me.
